message:
A Short Profile of the Abducted Student of Islamic University M Waliullah


Name - M Waliullah
Father - M Fazlur Rahman
Mother - Afifa Rahman
Address - Village: West Shailajalia, Thana: Kathaliya, District: Jhalkathi
Session – Honors : 2005-2006 (1st Class 1st), Masters - 2009-2010
Department - Dawah and Islamic Studies
Roll - 090245
Hall - Room No. 211 (International Block), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Hall
Activities –
•	Senior Member - Islamic University Debating Club.
•	Vice President - Bangabandhu Hall Debating Society. 
•	President of Barisal District Student Welfare Association, IU.
